author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is a backport of #36627. This update is a very technical change for better packaging.

#### PR validation:
This PR is tested with a wf 11650.0.
```bash
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 11650.0
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This PR is a backport of #36627. This backport must be preceded to backport of  #36883.
title: Move GEM offline DQM files from DQMOffline/Muon to DQM/GEM (backport of #36627, CMSSW_12_2_X)
